questions.question: 1. Document not printing
questions.answer:
1. Ensure the printer has paper and no paper jam
2. Clear any stuck print jobs
3. Confirm credentials are correct
4. Restart the printer

questions.question: 2. PC not booting
questions.answer:
1. Plug PC into a working power outlet
2. Check for power light indicator at the back
3. Hold the power button for 5–10 seconds
4. Contact IT Support

questions.question: 3. Internet or browser not working
questions.answer:
1. Try accessing www.mofep.gov.gh in another browser
2. Check network icon or Wi-Fi status
3. Confirm Ethernet light is on, if wired
4. Reinsert the Ethernet cable
5. Contact IT Support

questions.question: 4. Outlook not receiving emails
questions.answer:
1. Confirm internet is active
2. Check spam/junk folder and mailbox storage
3. Restart Outlook
4. Contact IT Support

questions.question: 5. Unable to sign in to Microsoft Office
questions.answer:
1. Ensure internet is working
2. Confirm login credentials
3. Restart your PC
4. Contact IT Support

questions.question: 6. PC not on domain
questions.answer: Contact IT Support via the official support form to resolve domain issues

questions.question: 7. Slow PC performance
questions.answer:
1. Delete unnecessary or large files to free up space
2. Close unused background apps
3. Restart the PC
4. Contact IT Support if unresolved

questions.question: 8. Slow internet connection
questions.answer:
1. Restart the router or your device
2. Contact IT Support for diagnostics

questions.question: 9. Wi-Fi not connecting
questions.answer:
1. Confirm Wi-Fi password is correct
2. Ensure device is discoverable and Wi-Fi is enabled
3. Contact IT Support

questions.question: 10. Faulty Ethernet cable
questions.answer: Contact IT Support for inspection or replacement

questions.question: 11. Password reset request
questions.answer: Contact IT Support via the official support form to reset your password securely

questions.question: 12. Monitor not displaying output
questions.answer:
1. Check power and display cables
2. Confirm monitor is powered on and correct input is selected
3. Try a different cable or monitor

questions.question: 13. Keyboard or mouse not working
questions.answer:
1. Reconnect the device or change batteries
2. Try different USB ports or another PC
3. Contact IT Support if unresponsive

questions.question: 14. Unable to access shared drive or folder
questions.answer:
1. Ensure you are connected to the network
2. Restart your PC
3. Contact IT Support for access permissions

questions.question: 15. Application crashing or not opening
questions.answer:
1. Restart the application or PC
2. Ensure the software is updated
3. Contact IT Support

questions.question: 16. Printer shows 'Offline' status
questions.answer:
1. Make sure the printer is powered on and network-connected
2. Set printer to 'Use Printer Online' in settings
3. Restart PC and printer

questions.question: 17. Audio not working
questions.answer:
1. Check volume settings and mute status
2. Confirm correct playback device is selected
3. Reconnect audio devices or restart PC

questions.question: 18. Screen freezing or system hanging
questions.answer:
1. Wait or press Ctrl + Alt + Delete to access Task Manager
2. End unresponsive tasks or restart the PC
3. Contact IT Support for persistent issues

questions.question: 19. Unable to access intranet or internal portals
questions.answer:
1. Confirm connection to the office network
2. Clear browser cache or try a different browser
3. Contact IT Support

questions.question: 20. VPN connection failing
questions.answer:
1. Ensure internet is active before connecting
2. Confirm VPN credentials
3. Restart VPN app or your device

questions.question: 21. File not saving or syncing to OneDrive
questions.answer:
1. Confirm you're signed into OneDrive with internet access
2. Check file path and name for unsupported characters
3. Restart OneDrive

questions.question: 22. Microsoft Teams not working
questions.answer:
1. Restart Teams or use the web version
2. Clear Teams cache from app settings
3. Confirm you’re logged into the correct account

questions.question: 23. Software installation request
questions.answer: Submit a request through the official IT support form for approval and installation

questions.question: 24. Security alert or suspicious email
questions.answer:
1. Do not click on any suspicious links or attachments
2. Report the email to IT Security via support form
3. Delete the email after reporting

questions.question: 25. Device auto-restarting or shutting down
questions.answer:
1. Check for overheating or blocked vents
2. Ensure all power cables are secure
3. Contact IT Support for hardware inspection
